post.body: *waves from his not shiney train*
Big Red Truck (presuming your Fire Trucks are indeed red)
I haz audio editing to do :P
I've got 4 min to stop thinking and start doing.
I didnt see any BRT photos, though! :P
It's handy for lots of things but you'll learn to ignore all applications LOL.
G'day mate, how's things? Are you enjoying Crackbook?
@shawno Night, guys! ;)
Same too when listening to commerical radio!
I bet you are looking forward to no work tomorrow!
That's doable for sure. As you heard, we've got time! ;)
@crispynoodles My school did Streamwatch at Peachtree Creek. It was something "the selective kids" did.
Glad you enjoyed it! The RT's are a lot of fun. Stay tuned for details of the next one!
Before today's shift, I had 25 to go. A lot of them are about an hour long.
Oh I could imagine you partying all night and sleeping all day.
@bengrubb Just heard the plug for Erk Pod on Tech Wired! Thanks, guys! Always interesting to hear other POV. Woo hoo!
Got to say that I'm glad I found Tech Wired AU. Listening to it now. Just the tech which is good.
Holy crap! That AC would have been very popular indeed!
A person would be forgiven for thinking he is already the President.
Ning grew faster than Twitter? Really? I only used it because that's where NaPodPoMo was based.
We'll see what you think when you check on the post on the computer
@limburger2001 Glad you read the entire tweet! :P
You must have been typing that for a while!
Dear Crispy, I'm really sore. And what's the red stuff oozing out of my head? Love, your Toe.
Educate Donut Boy's sister at Googlemail.com - iPod is great. No plans yet.
Howdy!
Howdy!
Not a lot. Just woke up. You?
You can see @ replies that feature you anywhere in the msg on m.slandr.net - Slandr FTW!
Not today we haven't! :P I'll get sleeping before you get me drunk :P Night!
And how can my widget for @rgspro say -10 but have a sun icon? :P
It could be worse - at least you are above 0! ;)
Bring it! LOL ;)
Saturday sleep in and not much. Sunday (weather permitting) we have a BBQ/Picnic with other Sydney tweeps.
Hey! So what are we doing this weekend?;)
Is your head spinning? :P
It feels like it, mate! I'm going around and around Sydney's Olympic precinct.
He shoots, he scores! Good work, my friend!
It's going to be MASSIVE! FYI, the UK does have armed police but they are specialists.
Hey Rich! Just listened to your latest show. It was cool ;)
Or if you are old school FCS
Totally! If you don't fit the "ideal" of the "average family" with a white picket fence and 2.5 children, you constantly get screwed!
Arvo Squeak!
Arvo Boi!
is going to bed now. Goodnight, interweb!
Weren't you asleep?
is wondering how much Pepsi @shawno had prior to recording Shawnogram! Note to self, talk more about this @ RTXII
Sounds like you are taking a major leak while recording Shawnogram! :P
LOL. But it is a hot pic too ;)
Morning, Kiwi! ;)
Considering I didn't know you last year, I wouldn't know any different if you didn't say anything! :P
On Thursday arvo I take a train ex Blacktown to Central but I think you are on night shift! :P
Nah. 8 hrs 25 min, 150km plus going to the DM's office.
I can be (you know that!) but I can say cockpit without giggling like a 13 year old boy.
Because where I sit isnt called a cockpit. That's where the pilot sits on a plane but that's not important right now.
LOL cockpit
*waves*
I was more thinking of your RT12 story.
I hear fish is good brain food ;)
Are you sitting on plat 20/21?
It's always bed 6! :P
He is in the country? Well spotted!
I'm on my 3rd UC interview so far today. Found you via @TeeMonster and @stephenkil
I'm enjoying the interviews while driving my train. I'll be listening to your novels on my 09 US road trip.
@vansunder It was a few EP episodes ago. I think the guy did live.
Ta. That's pretty much what Terrorgraph wrote minus quote from NSWFB.
0.9 something was the correct figure. I found one for 0.89 and as I spoke, @druey found the 0.9x.
The fire at your place made page 11 of the Terrorgraph.
I'm good. Halfway through my shift. I seem to find a lot of DUI stories. Hi 0.9 something
Time to think about driving a train.
What am I doing to do tonight? Mmmmm
Good afternoon, interweb!
I'm now home. I know that I have Sat/Sun off and beyond Sun is up to the Roster God on Sunday.
Home and working on the music and guest list for this weekend's Round Table 12. Sat AU/NZ, early Sat UK, Fri night US/Canadia www.erkpod.com
About to get in early practice for the V8 Supercar race around Olympic Park. Many many laps coming up!
Off to Blue Depot via PES. I have my NPS & my PED and I'm gonna need it. Anyone going to SOP later, come say hi! ;)
Good afternoon, interweb! ;)
Not many sleeps until Erk Pod Round Table 12 this weekend - last RT for 08! Sat AU/NZ, early Sat UK, Fri night US/Canadia www.erkpod.com.au
Home time! Yay! Long shift today!
Spending today with @jchutchins and his Ultra Creatives interview series. Going to East Hills.
